description.zh_CN: 将daily note无压笔记法和思源结合起来，想到什么就写什么，无压力做笔记。实验功能：当前支持任意格式的日记存储路径解析，新增支持黑暗模式,新增系统级全局快捷输入框,Ctrl+Shift+Q即可全局唤出
description.en_US: Combine daily note and siyuan, write down what you think, and take notes without pressure. Experimental function: the current support for any format of diary storage path analysis, new support for dark mode, new global shortcut input box
